data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module allows loading of various types of urls (including
    http, ftp, file, man, ghelp, info, etc) through the application
    user's default url handler in a GNOME environment.

    It will most likely be used in applications that make use of
    Gtk-Perl libraries (from LUPUS).
